title: Japan in winter
creator_credit: Japan. National Tourist Organisation and Sakura Motion Pictures
brief_description: Winter in Japan is a busy time of year with preparations for the celbration of the New Year. Colorful festivals take place, and the countryside, always of great beauty, is enhanced by snow.
